Describe how you envision this feature working. Be as detailed as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds? If so, please describe them.

## Benefits

Who would benefit from this feature? How would it improve SendSign?

## Implementation Suggestions

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, share them here. (Optional)
